name: "Golden Sun"
description:
CONTROLLS

Move with W,A,D or with the arrow keys.

STORY

This game is 2D Platform Adventure game where you play  as a spark. There are two sparks. One of them is called Spar, and the orange one Karki. After some levels strange things happened. 

LEVELS

There are three levels. 

One on the golden sun.

One Boss

The other side
